content:
Who am I#

Welcome to my blog, I am Asura.
A developer who focuses on the cloud native field, constantly pursues technological innovation, has great interest in new technologies, and develops language including, but not limited to, Golang, Rust, Java, shell and Python.
Love photography, travel, and like to challenge the unknown world.

欢迎来到我的博客
我是一个专注于云原生领域的开发者，不断追求技术创新，对新技术抱有极大兴趣，开发语言包括但不限于Golang，Rust，Java，shell和Python。
热爱摄影，旅行，喜欢挑战未知的世界。

Profile#

Location: beijing
EMail: sigasura@gmail.com
Github: https://github.com/G-Asura
